review: Amazing doctor. He solved a very long-term complication of my wife for which we even went to many hospitals such as reliance foundation hospital, lilavati nanavati etc. thanks! and he's very kind hearted, soft spoken and remembers you!!

My mother had burning sensation in foot so went to hospital. ****** *** ********* ** ********** ***. I would like to recommend the doctor to many people. There was no waiting time when we went. Tablets were prescribed by the doctor. Exercise was suggested.

My mom had been to hospital and it was for leg pain / arthritis issue.  ****** *** **** ** ********** ***. I am satisfied with the explanation and treatment given. I can surely recommend doctor to my family or friends circle. I can recommend practo as appointment was easy. There was not much waiting time in the hospital. Blood test was suggested. Doctor was friendly.
